attributes.action: Refuse funding to sections of Britain that want their own country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cornwall have stated they do not want people from outside of Cornwall to move to their area, as well as only visiting during tourist times.
If they like they want to be racist and their own rule why provide them with billions of pounds funding. Especially as they have just received millions of pounds from the EU!
The same goes for Scotland and WAles who both want to cut their ties with England and are increasingly racist towards other people of britain

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
